author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two militants were killed in the Kashmir Valley on Wednesday as two fierce encounters between militants and security forces broke out in Ganderbal and Pulwama districts.

The security forces trapped at least six militants in south Kashmir’s Pulwama district in the afternoon. “A search operation was launched in several villages after militants opened fire on the security forces in Wandakhpora village and fled to a nearby government plant nursery,” said a senior police officer.

Meeting

The police claim that a meeting of Lashkar-e-Taiba militants was under way in the area. Two militants were killed in several hours of gunfight.
title: 2 militants killed in Kashmir encounter
